title: Program Template Builder
description: Build your program using the magic of magic!

name.title: Program Name
name.description: A human-readable name for the program. Dispayed in the SaaSquatch Portal during Program setup.

summary.title: Program Summary
summary.description: A human-readable summary of the program. Dispayed in the SaaSquatch Portal during Program setup.

longDescription.title: Program Long Description
longDescription.description: A long-form article that sells the benefits of this program. Dispayed in the SaaSquatch Portal during Program setup.

rewards.title: Rewards
rewards.description: A list of all the possible types of rewards this program will give. Your business logic will trigger these based on key

emails.title: Emails
emails.description: A list of all the possible types of emails this program will send. Your business logic will trigger these based on key

rules.title: Business Rule Variables
rules.description: The business rule variables define a JSON schema of the possible configuration points in the business logic.

userFilter.title: User Filter
userFilter.description: This should be a GraphQL-compatible query json object

key.title: Schedule Key
key.description: A unique key identifier that distinguishes this schedule from other schedules

type.title: Schedule Filter Type
type.description: This describes the type of filter to be run for this schedule

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: This should be a GraphQL-compatible query json object

query.title: Schedule Query
query.description: The context query that will be executed when the schedule is triggered

linksConfig.title: Share Links Configuration
linksConfig.description: An object matching the program messages schema

periodInHours.description: Your program logic will be run on this schedule.

EmailType.title: Email Type
EmailType.description: A type of email that is given by this program.

key.title: Key
key.description: A unique key to identify this email type. Only numbers and latin characers are allowed. Email types must be unique within the scope of a program. e.g. `RewardCreatedEmail`

name.title: Name
name.description: A human-readable name for the email type that gets displayed in the SaaSquatch portal during program setup. e.g. `Reward Created Email`

description.title: Description
description.description: A human-readable description that explains this email type. Displayed in the SaaSquatch portal during program setup. e.g. `This email is sent when a new reward is created by this program`
description.default: We send this email when a new reward is created by this program

RewardType.title: Reward Type
RewardType.description: A type of reward that is given by this program.

key.title: Key
key.description: A unique key to identify this reward type. Only numbers and latin characers are allowed. Reward types must be unique within the scope of a program. e.g. `FirstPurchaseReward`

name.title: Name
name.description: A human-readable name for the reward type that gets displayed in the SaaSquatch portal during program setup. e.g. `First Purchase Reward`

description.title: Description
description.description: A human-readable description that explains this reward type. Displayed in the SaaSquatch portal during program setup. e.g. `This reward is given to people when they make their first purchase.`
description.default: This reward is given to people when they make their first purchase.
